thread.title: Oscar Nominee Mahershala Ali Is Now a Hot Dad
thread.title_full: Oscar Nominee Mahershala Ali Is Now a Hot Dad

title: Oscar Nominee Mahershala Ali Is Now a Hot Dad
text:
Amatus Sami-Karim and Mahershala Ali. Photo: Tibrina Hobson/WireImage Moonlight co-star Mahershala Ali and his wife Amatus Sami-Karim welcomed their first kiddo into the world earlier this week. Ali announced the birth with an adorable photo of Sami-Karim and newborn Bari Najma Ali on Instagram.
Ali is doing double Oscar duty this weekend with Hidden Figures , which is nominated for three Oscars, and Moonlight , which is up for eight Oscars. Ali is nominated for Best Supporting Actor for his role in Moonlight .
Bari (Bar-ee) Najma Ali ðŸ’œ2/22/17 #pisces 
A post shared by Mahershala Ali (@mahershalaali) on Feb 24, 2017 at 12:22pm PST
